snippet: The new campus of the Cornell University graduate school for technology is expected to transform Roosevelt Island from a sleepy community into a high-tech hothouse.
abstract: Campus of Cornell NYC Tech, graduate school for technology projected to open in 2017, is expected to transform Manhattan's Roosevelt Island from a sleepy community into a high-tech hothouse.
lead_paragraph: The new campus of the Cornell University graduate school for technology is expected to transform Roosevelt Island from a sleepy community into a high-tech hothouse.

headline.seo: Cornell Unveiling Plans for Roosevelt Island Tech Center
headline.main: In Bedroom Community, Birth of a Tech Center
headline.print_headline: In Bedroom Community, Birth of a Tech Center
